chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish's belly,
items.plainText: Then Jonah prayed unto the LORD his God out of the fish's belly,

items.text: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.
items.plainText: And said, I cried by reason of mine affliction unto the LORD, and he heard me; out of the belly of hell cried I, and thou heardest my voice.

items.text: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.
items.plainText: For thou hadst cast me into the deep, in the midst of the seas; and the floods compassed me about: all thy billows and thy waves passed over me.

items.text: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
items.plainText: Then I said, I am cast out of thy sight; yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.

items.text: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.
items.plainText: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul: the depth closed me round about, the weeds were wrapped about my head.

items.text: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.
items.plainText: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; the earth with her bars was about me for ever: yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption, O LORD my God.

items.text: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.
items.plainText: When my soul fainted within me I remembered the LORD: and my prayer came in unto thee, into thine holy temple.

items.text: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.
items.plainText: They that observe lying vanities forsake their own mercy.

items.text: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.
items.plainText: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that that I have vowed. Salvation is of the LORD.

items.text: And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
items.plainText: And the LORD spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
